description:
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!

(Source: MANGA Plus)

Notes:
- Nominated for the 2020 Manga Taisho Award.
- Winner of the 2021 Kono Manga ga Sugoi Award.
- Winner of the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award in the shounen category.
- Winner of the 2021 and 2022 Harvey Award for Best Manga.
- Chapters 1-97 were released in Weekly Shounen Jump from Dec 3, 2018 to Dec 13, 2020. The series resumed from Ch. 98 in Shounen Jump+ on July 12, 2022
synonyms: มนุษย์เลื่อยยนต์

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Psychosexual
tags.description: Work that involves the psychological aspects of sexual impulses.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Cosmic Horror
tags.description: A type of horror that emphasizes human insignificance in the grand scope of cosmic reality; fearing the unknown and being powerless to fight it.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Monster Boy
tags.description: Prominently features a male character who is a part-monster.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Human Pet
tags.description: Features characters in a master-slave relationship where one is the "owner" and the other is a "pet."

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Afterlife
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the afterlife.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Cannibalism
tags.description: Prominently features the act of consuming another member of the same species as food.

tags.name: Necromancy
tags.description: When the dead are summoned as spirits, skeletons, or the undead, usually for the purpose of gaining information or to be used as a weapon.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Femdom
tags.description: Female Dominance. Features sexual acts with a woman in a dominant position.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Mafia
tags.description: Centered around Italian organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Yakuza
tags.description: Centered around Japanese organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Zombie
tags.description: Prominently features reanimated corpses which often prey on live humans and turn them into zombies.

tags.name: Chimera
tags.description: Features a beast made by combining animals, usually with humans.

tags.name: Motorcycles
tags.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Vore
tags.description: Features a character being swallowed or swallowing another creature whole.

title.native: チェンソーマン バディ・ストーリーズ
チェンソーマン レゼ篇

alternative: Chainsaw no Akuma (チェンソーの悪魔)

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/TatuYukinobu)

Tatsu is a former assistant of the mangaka [Tatsuki Fujimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/119917/Tatsuki-Fujimoto) and [Yuuji Kaku](https://anilist.co/staff/119118/Yuuji-Kaku).

Toyama is currently an assistant of [Tatsuki Fujimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/119917/Tatsuki-Fujimoto)
